name: Simple Game Jam 3 - Gravity
description:
A very simple game made for the "Simple Game Jam 3"

You control a ship and have to survive as long as you can.

Fight the gravity by accelerating (left mouse); accelerating consumes energy which can be refilled by gathering the energy bonus.

Avoid or destroy enemies by shooting at them (right mouse)

HTML5 game available here: https://0d1ss30.itch.io/simple-game-jam-3-gravity-html5
